title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 187.1 - Purpose of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 187.1 - Purpose of part

State Regulations

This Part establishes procedures and standards for the
approval by the Industrial Commissioner of safety programs of non-profit
organizations or which are publicly funded in whole or in part, so as to
authorize the employment of minors 16 and 17 years of age in occupations in
which they have completed an approved work training program, as provided in
subdivision 4a(3) of section
133
of the Labor Law, as added by chapter 433 of the Laws of 1971. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
187.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
